title: A meal at Francis' = Un repas chez Francis
creator_credit: John Seabourne and Institut für Film und Bild
brief_description: An American girl and her French friend have lunch together in Paris. They look for a restaurant and then the American girl is shown how to order a meal, name foods and beverages, the French girl also explains French eating habits all carried out in simple slowly-spoken French.
